attributes.action: Support the conception of documentation following Coronovirus vaccination.
attributes.additional_details: It is imperative for the safety of all to ensure that everyone is vaccinated against Coronovirus. The concept of individual rights does not apply when the safety of all is at risk.
attributes.background: Instigate vaccination documentation to ensure the safety of all people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about monitoring of the health of people who have received a Covid-19 vaccine, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Safety monitoring of vaccines continues after it has received regulatory approval for use. You can read more about how the safety of vaccines is monitored here: https://post.parliament.uk/monitoring-covid-19-vaccine-safety-in-national-immunisation-programmes/

The Government published details of data published from UK’s independent medicines regulator in February, which confirmed approved vaccines meet strict regulatory standards for safety: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/latest-monitoring-data-confirms-safety-of-covid-19-vaccines
